## A work in progress
***
My exercise solutions to [**"R for Data Science"**](https://www.amazon.com/R-Data-Science-Hadley-Wickham/dp/1491910399/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&qid=1469550189&sr=8-1&keywords=R+for+data+science&linkCode=sl1&tag=devtools-20&linkId=6fe0069f9605cf847ed96c191f4e84dd) by Hadley Wickham & Garrett Grolemund. The online version of the book is available for [free](http://r4ds.had.co.nz/).

The solutions are organised by chapter.
